Bernie Sanders said they support a move such as eliminating the cap on the maximum taxable earnings as a way to close the cost gap of Social Security down the road. And it's not just us. There was a senator named Barack Obama who ran for president of the United States on exactly that position, Sen. Bernie Sanders said.
